Questions.Question: What is the primary advantage of blockchain technology mentioned in the material?
Which of the following is an example of a public blockchain?
What is the key role of consensus mechanisms in a blockchain network?

Answers.Text: To ensure all nodes agree on the state of the ledger

Questions.Question: What is a smart contract in the context of blockchain technology?

Answers.Text: A self-executing contract stored on the blockchain

What are the limitations of blockchain technology, as discussed in the material?
Once a block is added to the blockchain, it can be easily altered or deleted.
In permissionless blockchains, there are no restrictions on who can join the network.
Smart contracts are self-executing contracts that cannot be stored on the blockchain.
